languages.text: {n}Выстрел из автопистолета пробил Морту лоб и вышел из затылка вместе с фонтаном крови, мозгового вещества и обломков черепа — все это вы можете наблюдать на полу и мебели вокруг. Предохранитель на оружии архмилитанта снят — кажется, убийца опередил его на доли секунды.{/n}

{n}An autopistol shot went straight through Mort's forehead, spraying the floor and the furniture around with blood, brain matter, and shards of his skull. The safety on the Arch-Militant's weapon is off — the killer must have been a split second quicker than he.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Выстрел из автопистолета пробил Морту лоб и вышел из затылка вместе с фонтаном крови, мозгового вещества и обломков черепа — все это вы можете наблюдать на полу и мебели вокруг. Предохранитель на оружии архмилитанта снят — кажется, убийца опередил его на доли секунды.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}An autogun shot went straight through Mort's forehead, spraying the floor and the furniture around with blood, brain matter, and shards of his skull. The safety on the Arch-Militant's weapon is off — the killer must have been a split second quicker than he.{/n}

{n}An autogun shot went straight through Mort's forehead, spraying the floor and the furniture around with blood, brain matter, and shards of his skull. The safety on the Arch-Militant's weapon is off — the killer must have been a split second quicker than he.{/n}

{n}An autopistol shot went straight through Mort's forehead, spraying the floor and the furniture around with blood, brain matter, and shards of his skull. The safety on the Arch-Militant's weapon is off — the killer must have been a split second quicker than he.{/n}

{n}An autopistol shot went straight through Mort's forehead, spraying the floor and the furniture around with blood, brain matter, and shards of his skull. The safety on the Arch-Militant's weapon is off — the killer must have been a split second quicker than he.{/n}

{n}An autopistol shot went straight through Mort's forehead, spraying the floor and the furniture around with blood, brain matter, and shards of his skull. The safety on the Arch-Militant's weapon is off — the killer must have been a split second quicker than he.{/n}

languages.text: {n}自动手枪的子弹射穿了莫特的额头，血液、脑浆与头骨碎片喷洒在地板与四周的家具上。莫特武器上的保险栓已经拉开了，恐怕，他的动作只比凶手慢了那么一点点。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An autopistol shot went straight through Mort's forehead, spraying the floor and the furniture around with blood, brain matter, and shards of his skull. The safety on the Arch-Militant's weapon is off — the killer must have been a split second quicker than he.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}自动手枪的子弹射穿了莫特的额头，血液、脑浆与头骨碎片喷洒在地板与四周的家具上。莫特武器上的保险栓已经拉开了，恐怕，他的动作只比凶手慢了那么一点点。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un disparo de pistola automática atravesó directamente la frente de Mort, cubriendo el suelo y los muebles de sangre, trozos de seso y fragmentos de cráneo. El seguro del arma del Archimilitante está quitado: el asesino fue un instante más rápido que él.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An autopistol shot went straight through Mort's forehead, spraying the floor and the furniture around with blood, brain matter, and shards of his skull. The safety on the Arch-Militant's weapon is off — the killer must have been a split second quicker than he.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un disparo de pistola automática atravesó directamente la frente de Mort, cubriendo el suelo y los muebles de sangre, trozos de seso y fragmentos de cráneo. El seguro del arma del Archimilitante está quitado: el asesino fue un instante más rápido que él.{/n}

languages.text: {n}オートピストルの弾がモートの額を直撃し、床や周囲の家具に血液、脳みそ、頭蓋骨の破片が飛び散った。アーク・ミリタントの武器の安全装置が外れていたということは…殺人者は彼より一瞬でも速かったに違いない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An autopistol shot went straight through Mort's forehead, spraying the floor and the furniture around with blood, brain matter, and shards of his skull. The safety on the Arch-Militant's weapon is off — the killer must have been a split second quicker than he.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}オートピストルの弾がモートの額を直撃し、床や周囲の家具に血液、脳みそ、頭蓋骨の破片が飛び散った。アーク・ミリタントの武器の安全装置が外れていた…殺人者は彼より一瞬でも速かったに違いない。{/n}
{n}オートピストルの弾がモートの額を直撃し、床や周囲の家具に血液、脳みそ、頭蓋骨の破片が飛び散った。アーク・ミリタントの武器の安全装置が外れていたということは…殺人者は彼より一瞬でも速かったに違いない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un tir de pistolet-mitrailleur a traversé le front de Mort, éclaboussant le sol et les objets environnants de sang, de cervelle et de morceaux d'os. Le cran de sûreté de son arme est levé... Le tueur a dû être plus rapide que lui d'une fraction de seconde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An autopistol shot went straight through Mort's forehead, spraying the floor and the furniture around with blood, brain matter, and shards of his skull. The safety on the Arch-Militant's weapon is off — the killer must have been a split second quicker than he.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un tir de pistolet-mitrailleur a traversé le front de Mort, éclaboussant le sol et les objets environnants de sang, de cervelle et de morceaux d'os. Le cran de sûreté de son arme est levé... Le tueur a dû être plus rapide que lui d'une fraction de seconde.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Schuss einer Maschinenpistole ist direkt in Morts Stirn eingedrungen. Der Boden und die umstehenden Möbel weisen Spritzer von Blut, Gehirnmasse und Splitter seines Schädels auf. Die Sicherung der Waffe des Erzmilitanten ist deaktiviert – der Mörder muss einen Sekundenbruchteil schneller gewesen sein als er.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An autopistol shot went straight through Mort's forehead, spraying the floor and the furniture around with blood, brain matter, and shards of his skull. The safety on the Arch-Militant's weapon is off — the killer must have been a split second quicker than he.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Schuss einer Maschinenpistole ist direkt in Morts Stirn eingedrungen. Der Boden und die umstehenden Möbel weisen Spritzer von Blut, Gehirnmasse und Splitter seines Schädels auf. Die Sicherung der Waffe des Erzmilitanten ist deaktiviert – der Mörder muss einen Sekundenbruchteil schneller gewesen sein als er.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ototabancadan çıkan bir mermi, Mort'un alnından girerek yere ve etraftaki mobilyalara kan ile beyin ve kafatası parçaları saçmış. Başmilitanın silahının emniyeti kapalı. Katil ondan bir an daha erken davranmış gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An autopistol shot went straight through Mort's forehead, spraying the floor and the furniture around with blood, brain matter, and shards of his skull. The safety on the Arch-Militant's weapon is off — the killer must have been a split second quicker than he.{/n}
